wxExStatusBarPane Class Reference

This class defines our statusbar panes, used by wxExFrame::SetupStatusBar. More...

 Constructor.

Detailed Description

This class defines our statusbar panes, used by wxExFrame::SetupStatusBar.

It just adds some members to the base class, and keeps a static total.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

int  style = wxSB_NORMAL 
) [inline]

Default constructor.

This constructs the pane text field.

wxExStatusBarPane::wxExStatusBarPane ( const wxString &  name,
int  width = 50,
const wxString &  helptext = wxEmptyString,
int  style = wxSB_NORMAL 
) [inline]

Constructor.

Parameters:
name The name of the pane. The wxextension lib uses PaneLexer, PaneInfo, PaneFileType, by setting up one of these panes, youre panes will get controlled by the lib.
width Width of the field
helptext The helptext shown as a tooltip. If you do no provide helptext, it is derived from the name, by using text after the first 'e' character (so after 'Pane').
style The style.
